Compliance description: Verify if the code maintains structured metadata, including source details, timestamps, and schema definitions.
Ensure that the code implements dataset versioning to track different versions for reproducibility and rollback capabilities.
Check if the code validates incoming data against predefined formats and structures to ensure compliance.
Assess whether the code includes checks to maintain data quality and consistency throughout preprocessing.
Check if the code computes relevant metrics such as accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score for classification, or RMSE, MAE for regression.
Assess whether the code includes techniques to detect and mitigate model biases against specific groups.
Verify if the code uses SHAP, LIME, or feature importance scores to explain model predictions.
Check if the code evaluates the modelâ€™s generalization ability using a validation set.
Check if the code logs hyperparameters, metrics, and model configurations for reproducibility.
Verify if the code stores models in a registry like MLflow or ModelDB for version control.
Verify if the code logs key metrics like accuracy, latency, and throughput in production.
Check if the code includes mechanisms to track shifts in input data distribution.
Ensure the code maintains logs of predictions, failures, and user feedback for debugging.
